## Span interface

A source span indicating a segment of FQL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Span
```

## Properties

| Property                             | Modifiers | Type   | Description                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------ | --------- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [end](./fauna.span.end.md)           |           | number | The span's ending index within the src, inclusive.                                                                     |
| [function](./fauna.span.function.md) |           | string | The name of the enclosing function, if applicable.                                                                     |
| [src](./fauna.span.src.md)           |           | string | A string identifier of the FQL source. For example, if performing a raw query against the API this would be \*query\*. |
| [start](./fauna.span.start.md)       |           | number | The span's starting index within the src, inclusive.                                                                   |
